1.2.name: wordpress/qiniu-speed
1.2.description: 1) Break through the server maximum upload file size limit! 2) Now,Qiniu provide free 10GB space.it means that you will have the accessory space free 10GB! 3) Implementation of WordPress static file CDN acceleration, maximum speed up access! 4) All of media file operations can be done in WordPress back-stage management, without login FTP when upload large file! 5) Save a lot of money to buy server space and bandwidth!
